Title: How to Truly Connect with Students (and Why It Matters)
Description:
Students won't learn if they don't feel seen. 💡

In this inspiring episode, veteran educator Dr. Lucy Lambert-Guesnard shares practical ways to build trust, connection, and authentic classroom relationships—especially with students who struggle. From real stories like “Larry with the hoodie” to “Joey with the basketball,” Dr. Lucy offers compassionate strategies that help teachers turn everyday moments into meaningful teaching breakthroughs.

Learn how to give better feedback, handle tough behavior with grace, and build a classroom culture where every student feels valued.
